headline: ORIEL 68830
description: Constant Current Power Supply    Remote capability for external control, modulation and photo feedback.
categories.lvl1: Optical / Photonic Equipment > Other Optical / Photonic Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Oriel
Model 68830
Description Constant Current Power Supply
Other Information Analog power meter; 230 V, 4 A
DC Output:
  • Power: 300 Watt
  • Current: 0 to 15 Amp
  • Voltage: 0-30 Volt
    This unit will power the following lamps
  • Model 6318--10 W QTH
  • Model 6319--20 W QTH
  • Model 6332--50 W QTH
  • Model 6337--50 W QTH
  • Model 6333--100 W QTH
  • Model 6334--250 W QTH
  • Model 6373--140 W Infrared Emitter
  • Model 6575--55 W Ceramic Element
Power Requirements 115 V 8.0 A 4.0 A(2) 50/60 Hz
Year of Manufacture 1992
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 12.000 in (30.5 cm)
Depth 16.000 in (40.6 cm)
Height 5.500 in (14.0 cm)
Weight 20 lb (9 kg)
